thing-type.label: ZW062 Aeon Labs Garage Door Controller Gen5
thing-type.description: Aeon Labs Garage Door Controller Gen5<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtAeon Labs Garage Door Controller is a smart and wireless Garage Door Control system, you can control the garage door to open, close, or stop moving via wireless signal on your gateway client or phone application.</p&gt <p&gtThe Garage Door Controller allows you to configure different alarm sounds to indicate the door ’s action.</p&gt <p&gtEach action alarm sound can be customized. To change or update new alarm sounds for the Garage Door Controller, connect the Garage Door Controller to your PC host with a USB cable and download your sound files to the flash memory (128 MB) of the Garage Door Controller.</p&gt <p&gtIt can be included and operated in any Z-wave network with other Z-wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. All non-battery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network.</p&gt <p&gtIt is also a security Z-wave device and supports the Over The Air (OTA) feature for the product’s firmware upgrade.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtAdd Garage Door Controller into Z-Wave Network:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtInstall Garage Door Controller, and connect it to the 5V DC Adapter.</li&gt <li&gtLet the primary controller into inclusion mode (If you don’t know how to do this, please refer to its manual).</li&gt <li&gtPress the Z-Wave Button.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtRemove Garage Door Controller from Z-Wave Network:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtInstall Garage Door Controller, and connect it to the 5V DC Adapter.</li&gt <li&gtLet the primary controller into exclusion mode (If you don’t know how to do this, refer to its manual).</li&gt <li&gtPress the Z-Wave Button.</li&gt <li&gtIf the remove is failed, please repeat the process from step 2.</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtNote: If Garage Door Controller is removed from Z-wave network, it will be reset to factory default.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_32_1
parameter.label: 32: Startup ringtone
parameter.description: Configure the default startup ringtone<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the default startup ringtone.</p&gt <p&gtValue=0, disable the Startup ringtone.<br /&gtValue=others, Enable and select a startup ringtone for the Garage Door Controller.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_34_1_wo
parameter.label: 34: Sensor Calibration
parameter.description: Perform Sensor Calibration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSensor Calibration.</p&gt <p&gt<br /&gtCalibration Steps:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtLet the garage door move to full close position.</li&gt <li&gtSend this parameter (0x22) with “value=1” to Garage Door Controller.</li&gt <li&gtLet the garage door move to full open position.</li&gt <li&gtLet the garage door move to full close position after the step 3 is completed.</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtAfter the step 4 is completed, all calibration steps are complete.</p&gt <p&gtNote: This process should be implemented when the Garage Door Controller just only has one Sensor is installed on the garage door.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_35_2
parameter.label: 35: Calibration timout
parameter.description: Set the timeout of all calibration steps for the Sensor.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet the timeout of all calibration steps for the Sensor.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_36_1
parameter.label: 36: Number of alarm musics
parameter.description: Get the number of alarm musics<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtGet the numbers of alarm music.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_37_4_000000FF
parameter.label: 37: Disable opening alarm
parameter.description: Disable opening alarm<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the alarm mode when the garage door is opening.</p&gt <p&gtValue4=0, disable the alarm prompt. <br /&gtValue4=1, enable the alarm prompt.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_37_4_0000FF00
parameter.label: 37: Opening alarm volume
parameter.description: Opening alarm volume<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the alarm mode when the garage door is opening.</p&gt <p&gtValue3: configure the volume of alarm sound (there are 10 levels, the min volume is 1 level and the max volume is 10 levels).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_37_4_00FF0000
parameter.label: 37: Opening alarm choice
parameter.description: Alarm mode when the garage door is opening<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the alarm mode when the garage door is opening.</p&gt <p&gtValue2: configure the alarm sound (there are 4 types sound saved in EEPROM and user also can update it).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_37_4_0F000000
parameter.label: 37: Opening alarm LED mode
parameter.description: Opening alarm LED mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the alarm mode when the garage door is opening.</p&gt <p&gtValue1: configure the frequency of blinking for the Alarm LED , there are 10 levels from 1 to 10, the minimum frequency is level 1 and the max frequency is level 10.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_38_4_000000FF
parameter.label: 38: Disable closing alarm
parameter.description: Disable closing alarm<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the alarm mode when the garage door is closing.</p&gt <p&gtValue4=0, disable the alarm prompt.<br /&gtValue4=1, enable the alarm prompt.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_38_4_0000FF00
parameter.label: 38: Closing alarm volume
parameter.description: Closing alarm volume<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the alarm mode when the garage door is closing.</p&gt <p&gtValue3: configure the volume of alarm sound (there are 10 levels, the min volume is 1 level and the max volume is 10 levels).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_38_4_00FF0000
parameter.label: 38: Closing alarm choice
parameter.description: Alarm mode when the garage door is closing<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the alarm mode when the garage door is closing.</p&gt <p&gtValue2: configure the alarm sound (there are 4 types sound saved in EEPROM and user also can update it).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_38_4_0F000000
parameter.label: 38: Closing alarm LED mode
parameter.description: Closing alarm LED mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigure the alarm mode when the garage door is closing.</p&gt <p&gtValue1: configure the frequency of blinking for the Alarm LED , there are 10 levels from 1 to 10, the minimum frequency is level 1 and the max frequency is level 10.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_39_4
parameter.label: 39: Unknown state alarm mode
parameter.description: Configuration alarm mode when the garage door is in "unknown" state<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfiguration alarm mode when the garage door is in<br /&gt"unknown" state:<br /&gt1, Value1: configure the frequency of blinking for the Alarm<br /&gtLED , there are 10 levels that 1 to10 level, the minimum<br /&gtfrequency is level 1 and the max frequency is level 10.<br /&gt2, Value2: configure the alarm sound (there are 4 types sound<br /&gtsaved in EEPROM and user also can update it).<br /&gt3, Value3: configure the volume of alarm sound (there are 10<br /&gtlevels, the min volume is 1 level and the max volume is 10</p&gt <p&gtlevels).<br /&gt4, Value4=0, disable the alarm prompt. Value4=1, enable the<br /&gtalarm prompt.</p&gt <p&gtdefault values:</p&gt <p&gtValue1=4<br /&gtValue2=3<br /&gtValue3=8<br /&gtValue4=0</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_40_4
parameter.label: 40: Closed alarm mode
parameter.description: Configure the alarm mode when the garage door is in closed position.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfiguration alarm mode when the garage door is in<br /&gt"closed" state:<br /&gt1, Value1: configure the frequency of blinking for the Alarm<br /&gtLED , there are 10 levels that 1 to10 level, the minimum<br /&gtfrequency is level 1 and the max frequency is level 10.<br /&gt2, Value2: configure the alarm sound (there are 4 types sound<br /&gtsaved in EEPROM and user also can update it).<br /&gt3, Value3: configure the volume of alarm sound (there are 10<br /&gtlevels, the min volume is 1 level and the max volume is 10 levels).<br /&gt4, Value4=0, disable the alarm prompt. Value4=1, enable the<br /&gtalarm prompt.</p&gt <p&gtdefault values:</p&gt <p&gtValue1=2<br /&gtValue2=4<br /&gtValue3=8<br /&gtValue4=0</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_41_1
parameter.label: 41: Tamper switch configuration
parameter.description: Configuration report for the tamper switch State<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfiguration report for the tamper switch state:<br /&gt1, Value=0x00: Sensor is not removed<br /&gt2, Value=0x0F: Sensor is removed</p&gt <p&gt<br /&gtNote:<br /&gt1. The Garage Door Controller will send this configuration report to gateway controller or associated nodes automatically if the Sensor is removed.<br /&gt2. You can send the value=0x55555555 of this parameter to controller to relieve the alarm state.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_42_1
parameter.label: 42: Battery state
parameter.description: Configuration report for the battery state of Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfiguration report for the battery state of Sensor:<br /&gt1, Value=0x00: battery power is nominal.<br /&gt2, Value=0x0F: battery power of Sensor is in low battery.<br /&gtIt will report the battery power state to associated nodes automatically when the battery power is in low battery.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_43_1_wo
parameter.label: 43: Play or Pause ringtone
parameter.description: Start playing or Stop playing the ringtone<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtStart playing or Stop playing the ringtone:<br /&gt1, Value=255, stop playing ringtone.<br /&gt2, Value=1 to 100, start playing the ringtone that you selected.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_44_1_wo
parameter.label: 44: Ringtone test volume
parameter.description: Set volume for test of ringtone<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTest the volume of the current ringtone.</p&gt <p&gtValue=1 to value=10, which map to the volume level 1 to level 10.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_45_2
parameter.label: 45: Temperature
parameter.description: Get the environment temperature<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtGet the environment temperature:<br /&gtThe temperature value contains one decimal point. E.g. If the report value=252, the temperature is 25.2 °C .<br /&gtRange is 0 to 500 (0 to 50.0 °C ).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_47_1
parameter.label: 47: Button definition
parameter.description: Define the function of Button- or Button+.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefine the function of Button- or Button+.<br /&gtValue=0, short pressing the “Button +/-” will be used to adjust the volume of sound. Long pressing the “Button +/-” will be used to switch the sound to the next.<br /&gtValue=1, short pressing the “Button +/-” will be used to switch the sound to the next. Long pressing the “Button +/-” will be used to adjust the volume of sound.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_80_1
parameter.label: 80: Door state change report type
parameter.description: Configure the door state change report type<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIt will send the Hail CC/configuration report CC when the state of garage door is changed:</p&gt <p&gt1, Value=0 , reserved.<br /&gt 2, Value=1 , send Hail CC<br /&gt 3, Value=2 , send Barrier operator report CC</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_241_4
parameter.label: 241: Pair the Sensor
parameter.description: Pair the Sensor with Garage Door Controller<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtPair the Sensor with Garage Door Controller.</p&gt <p&gtSend Configuration Set:<br /&gtValue=0x55555501, which will trigger to start the pairing of Sensor (installed on the top of the garage door), at this time, the Network LED on the Garage Door Controller will blink slowly and then short press Tamper Switch back of the Sensor.<br /&gtIf pairing is successful, the Network LED will stop blinking and the Garage Door Controller will send the configuration report with value=0x01FF to primary controller/gateway. Otherwise, repeat the operation.</p&gt <p&gtNote:<br /&gt1. If you do not press the Tamper Switch when starting the pairing mode, the pairing status will keep for 8 second and then exit the pairing status automatically.<br /&gt2. The Sensor has been paired with the Garage Door Controller after factory.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_252_1
parameter.label: 252: Lock Configuration
parameter.description: Enable/disable configuration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtEnable/disable configuration<br /&gt1, Value=0 : Enable.<br /&gt2, Value=1 : Disable.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Group 1
parameter.description: Position status changed<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtWhen the state of load (position status) is changed:</p&gt <p&gt1, Set Configuration parameter 80 to 0 : Reserved (Default).<br /&gt2, Set Configuration parameter 80 to 1 : Send Hail CC.<br /&gt3, Set Configuration parameter 80 to 2: send Barrier operator report CC.</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Group 2
parameter.description: Forward the Basic Set<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtForward the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set commands to associated nodes in Group 2 when the Garage Door Controller receives the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set commands from main controller.</p&gt
